p: Microorganisms Staphylococcus aureus PTCC 1431, Bacillus subtilis PTCC 1023, Pseudomonas aeruginosa PTCC 1074, Escherichia coli PTCC 1330, Pseudomonas syringae subsp . Syringae ICMP 5089, Pseudomonas viridiflava ICMP 2848, Rathayibacter toxicus ICMP 9525, and Xanthomonas campestris pv. Campestris ICMP 13 were obtained from the Sari Agricultural and Natural Resources University (SANRU) microbiology laboratory.
